message: when starting the protocol with a capital letter, the colon will be missing in the link. Http://www.heise.de/
and going off of this also can we get a parsing for irc:// protocol
looks like you're correct but since I don't usually uppercase the "H" this is the first I've seen this issue. http://craigshipp.com works.
i usually write the protocol lowercase too, but when typing sth via swype the first character is upper case by default. that's how i stumbled uppon this bug
actually it is parsing the url correctly for me
but it is adding an extra http:// for it
i just hovered over the link and did not check the source. you are correct, it adds another protocol prefix
